title: The Return of Jake Karter
description: Jake Karter is at a loss. Which is the operative word, because his losses are many. He has lost Rachel, and his passion for women. But worst of all, he has lost the manuscript for his priceless memoir, which has been stolen by a dangerous and powerful adversary - who intends to exploit Jake's work, and to expose him, together with almost every lover he's ever known...
author: Jake Karter
